when i try to play this this message comes up "Windows Media Player cannot play the file. The Player might not support the file type or might not support the codec that was used to compress the file." can anyone tell me what codec i need to play this
sknsfan2009: Get yourself VLC mediaplayer, it comes with codecs for most formats. \"If VLC can\'t play it, it\'s probably crap anyways....!\" :)
